wwpGenIgmpSnoopMIB.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopMIB

revisions.description: This MIB specifies the managed objects for IGMP per vlan Snooping specific to the WWP products.
A new object for igmp snoop packet priority is added.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopMIB.contactinfo: Mib Meister Postal: World Wide Packets P.O. Box 950 Veradale, WA 99037 USA Phone: +1 509 242 9000 Email: mib.meister@worldwidepackets.com
wwpGenIgmpSnoopMIB.description: Revised with 2 new objects added, wwpGenIgmpSnoopLeaveMode wwpGenIgmpSnoopInqLeaveTimeout.0

PortList.name: PortList
PortList.description: Each octet within this value specifies a set of eight ports, with the first octet specifying ports 1 through 8, the second octet specifying ports 9 through 16, etc. Within each octet, the most significant bit represents the lowest numbered port, and the least significant bit represents the highest numbered port. Thus, each port of the bridge is represented by a single bit within the value of this object. If that bit has a value of '1' then that port is included in the set of ports; the port is not included if its bit has a value of '0'.

VlanId.name: VlanId
VlanId.description: A 12-bit VLAN ID used in the VLAN Tag header.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopGlobalActivate.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopGlobalActivate
wwpGenIgmpSnoopGlobalActivate.description: Activate the GenIgmp Box wide Snooping operation with a value of True(1) or stop it with False(2).

wwpGenIgmpSnoopActTable.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopActTable
wwpGenIgmpSnoopActTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing the vlans on which the igmp snoping is enabled/disabled.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopActEntry.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopActEntry
wwpGenIgmpSnoopActEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the wwpGenIgmpSnoopActTable.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopActVlanId.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopActVlanId
wwpGenIgmpSnoopActVlanId.description: The vlan for which this igmp snooping can be enabled/disabled.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopRouterPort.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopRouterPort
wwpGenIgmpSnoopRouterPort.description: The router port from which the igmp query messages are received, and joins/leaves messages are sent. If there is no router port associated, the object will return 0.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopActivate.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopActivate
wwpGenIgmpSnoopActivate.description: Activate the GenIgmp Snooping operation with a value of True(1) or stop it with False(2).

wwpGenIgmpSnoopTable.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopTable
wwpGenIgmpSnoopTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing the IP multicast groups for which there are members on particular vlans.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopEntry.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopEntry
wwpGenIgmpSnoopEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the wwpGenIgmpSnoopTable.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopVlanId.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopVlanId
wwpGenIgmpSnoopVlanId.description: The vlan for which this entry contains information for an IP multicast group address.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopGroupAddress.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopGroupAddress
wwpGenIgmpSnoopGroupAddress.description: The IP multicast group address for which this entry contains information.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopActivePorts.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopActivePorts
wwpGenIgmpSnoopActivePorts.description: The Port Map of the active ports for the igmp filter indexed by wwpGenIgmpSnoopVlanId and wwpGenIgmpSnoopGroupAddress.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryTime.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryTime
wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryTime.description: The time at which the last activity was observed on this stream.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopNoOfHosts.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopNoOfHosts
wwpGenIgmpSnoopNoOfHosts.description: The number of hosts associated with this entry.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsTable.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsTable
wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing the igmp snoop stats per vlan.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsEntry.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsEntry
wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsTable.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsVlanId.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsVlanId
wwpGenIgmpSnoopStatsVlanId.description: The vlan Id for which this igmp snooping can be enabled/disabled.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryMessages.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryMessages
wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryMessages.description: The total number of query messages snooped.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopJoinMessages.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopJoinMessages
wwpGenIgmpSnoopJoinMessages.description: The total number of Join messages snooped.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopLeaveMessages.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopLeaveMessages
wwpGenIgmpSnoopLeaveMessages.description: The total number of leave messages snooped.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopRouterDiscards.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopRouterDiscards
wwpGenIgmpSnoopRouterDiscards.description: The total number of messages discarded by the Router.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopLingerTimeout.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopLingerTimeout
wwpGenIgmpSnoopLingerTimeout.description: This value specifies the amount of time that a multicast filter will be in place after the last host has left. In essence it configures how long to filter the stream after all the hosts have left the group. This can tune the system as to how long the router has to remove the stream from the subnet. The minimum value is 1 second, with no maximum value.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopExpiryTimeout.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopExpiryTimeout
wwpGenIgmpSnoopExpiryTimeout.description: The interval of time for which an igmp protocol entry, is allowed to remain valid without any activity.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryRespTimeout.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryRespTimeout
wwpGenIgmpSnoopQueryRespTimeout.description: The interval of time for which an igmp protocol entry, is allowed to wait for any igmp query. This refers to the default minimum query timeout on WWP devices.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopFilterActivate.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopFilterActivate
wwpGenIgmpSnoopFilterActivate.description: Activate the GenIgmp Snoop Filtering operation with a value of True(1) or stop it with False(2).

wwpGenExtIgmpSnoopActEntryTable.name: wwpGenExtIgmpSnoopActEntryTable
wwpGenExtIgmpSnoopActEntryTable.description: A table that contains Vlan Specific igmp config information maintained by each Vlan.

wwpGenExtIgmpSnoopActEntry.name: wwpGenExtIgmpSnoopActEntry
wwpGenExtIgmpSnoopActEntry.description: A list of Vlan specific IGMP config parameters maintained by each Vlan.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopMinQueryTimeout.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopMinQueryTimeout
wwpGenIgmpSnoopMinQueryTimeout.description: The minimum interval of time for which an igmp protocol entry associated with this vlan is allowed to wait for any igmp query.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopUnresolvedMcastFilter.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopUnresolvedMcastFilter
wwpGenIgmpSnoopUnresolvedMcastFilter.description: Setting this object to 'true' will enable the Unresolved Multicast Filtering for the vlan specified by wwpGenIgmpSnoopActVlanId.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopPktPriority.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopPktPriority
wwpGenIgmpSnoopPktPriority.description: The 802.1p Priority value for the igmp snoop pkts on this vlan.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopLeaveMode.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopLeaveMode
wwpGenIgmpSnoopLeaveMode.description: Setting the igmp leave mode to 'fast(1)' will cause the multicast stream to be pruned as soon as a leave is received. If this object is set to 'inquisitive(2)', then a Group Specific Query is created for the multicast stream for which the leave was received. If no membership report is received in the time interval configured by the wwpGenIgmpSnoopInqLeaveTimeout, then the multicast stream is pruned.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopInqLeaveTimeout.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopInqLeaveTimeout
wwpGenIgmpSnoopInqLeaveTimeout.description: The interval of time in units of 0.1 ( tenth ) seconds for which the Group Specific Query, is allowed to wait for any response. The inquisitive leave timer is started only when the wwpIgmpSnoopLeaveMode is set to 'inquisitive(2)'.

wwpGenIgmpSnoopUMFFilterGlobal.name: wwpGenIgmpSnoopUMFFilterGlobal
wwpGenIgmpSnoopUMFFilterGlobal.description: Setting this object to 'true' will enable the Unresolved Multicast Filtering (UMF) for the device. When 'true' unresolved multicast packets will not be forwarded. When 'false' unresolved multicast packets will be forwarded to the other ports in the VLAN. If the device supports per-VLAN UMF, when this object is set to 'true' then the per-VLAN UMF setting will take effect. When this object is set to 'false' then unresolved multicast filtering is inhibited on all VLANs.
